user.name: Jordan Burgess
user.description: pro technology, pro humanity   @anthropicai. cofounder @humanloop

fullText:
One of the Anthropic principles is to "do the simple thing that works"

so the idea for making AI do some tasks reliable comes down to a sharable folder of markdown files, scripts and resources 

 It's now an open standard adopted by many: https://t.co/d0thIm6PUx
